statements: SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT response_id, respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT response_id, respondent_name FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT response_id, respondent_name FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT response_id, survey_id, respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS response_count FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id HAVING response_count > 5 ORDER BY response_count DESC
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 123;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_name FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 10;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE survey_name LIKE '%customer%' AND survey_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT respondent_id, COUNT(response_id) AS response_count FROM survey_responses GROUP BY respondent_id HAVING response_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses JOIN surveys ON survey_responses.survey_id = surveys.survey_id ORDER BY survey_responses.response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT survey_id, survey_title FROM surveys;
SELECT respondent_id, respondent_name FROM respondents WHERE respondent_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 1001 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, survey_title, COUNT(response_id) AS response_count FROM surveys JOIN survey_responses ON surveys.survey_id = survey_responses.survey_id GROUP BY survey_id, survey_title;
SELECT survey_title, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT respondent_name, respondent_email FROM respondents WHERE respondent_id = 3;
SELECT response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_id = 2;
SELECT survey_title, survey_description FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT survey_id, question_id, response FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 123;
SELECT survey_name, created_at FROM surveys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM questions WHERE question_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'jo%';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, response FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 3;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(response_id) FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT * FROM surveys INNER JOIN survey_responses ON surveys.survey_id = survey_responses.survey_id;
SELECT survey_name, created_at FROM surveys WHERE survey_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT survey_id FROM survey_responses);
SELECT * FROM survey_respondent;
SELECT name, email FROM survey_respondent WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT question_text FROM survey_question ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM survey_response WHERE respondent_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM survey_response_category WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM survey_respondent WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT respondent_id, name FROM survey_respondent WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM survey_question ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT respondent_id, count(response_id) FROM survey_response GROUP BY respondent_id HAVING count(response_id) > 3;

SELECT sr.name, sq.question_text FROM survey_respondent sr INNER JOIN survey_response sres ON sr.respondent_id = sres.respondent_id INNER JOIN survey_question sq ON sres.question_id = sq.question_id WHERE sres.response_date >= '2022-01-01';
